short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Team notes on web pages, stored in your company Airtable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hive is a browser extension that lets your team attach tips and warnings to any web page.

Notes are stored in your team's private Airtable, so you're always in control of your data.

This is an Open Source extension. You are welcome to report issues and contribute at https://github.com/seifip/hive-notes/
